titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Belize
Belize

div.head: Legislation
div.p: Belize has a Freedom of Information Act that passed in 2000 that gives researchers the right to request access to government documents.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs: NEMO Building, PO Box 174, Belmopan
Archives and Records Service: 26/28 Unity Blvd., Belmopan.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: A person who wishes to obtain access to a document of a Ministry or prescribed authority shall make a request in writing to the Ministry or prescribed authority for access to the document.
